item.title: Webauthn notes
item.description: FIDO Fast Identity Online (FIDO) WebAuthn was officially recognized as a W3C web standard in March 2019. Today, WebAuthn is part of the FIDO Allianceâ€™s FIDO2 specifications and the FIDO Alliance runs certification programs to ensure compliance
